definitions.title: n. pr.
definitions.body: Kt, in phr. ´[[בְּנֵי נ]] Ezr 2:50, Qr [[נְפוּסִים]], of family of returned exiles; LXX Nafeiswn, A Nefouseim, LXXL Nefwseim; = [[נפושׁסים]] Ne 7:52 Kt, Qr [[נְפִישְׁסִים]], LXX Nefwsasei, etc., LXXL Nefouseim;—Kt Ezr and Qr Ne, respectively, are prob. to be preferred (cf. [[נׇפִישׁ]] sub [[נפשׁ]]), but Ne has mixture of two variants, [[נפיסים]], [[נפישׁים]].
